oai_dc:dc.dc:title: REFLECTION PERFORMANCE OF ROCK ARMOURED SLOPES IN RANDOM WAVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Allsop, N.W.H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: random waves
reflection
armor
armored slope
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Waves reflected from breakwaters and sea walls may cause navigation or mooring problems in or near harbours, and may increase beach erosion or local scour. This paper gives results of hydraulic model tests on the reflection characteristics of idealised rock armoured slopes. Examples of the performance of a number of practical structures are also discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
